review:
I visited Dr. Mona when my 7 year old was having learning difficulties and behavioral difficulties.She is the Best Pediatric neurologist who comes from so much of year of experience in this field.
I should say I'm very satisfied with
the services provided. Dr.Mona
helped with the medications and diagnosis of
my kid and also started the therapies needed
for my kid. It's been almost a year now and I have
seen a lot of improvement in my kid in all aspects.
We also found all the doctor us very much supportive, calmly listens to your problem, approachable and helpful who also try to understand parent's point of view. I would highly recommend others parents of
children with special needs related to paed. neuro
to visit Dr. Mona. 
She has the best knowledge in her field of expertise and treats patients very well. We as a parents will be very thankful to her our whole life.

We have been seeing Dr Gajre since November last year as our nine-year old son faced some difficulties in academics due to his short attention span. His school had suggested her name. She has been quite accurate and effective in her diagonasis , assessment and her treatment plans. In her, we found a sympathetic person, too, as she has always been gentle, patient and open to our suggestions and observations concerning the treatment and progress of our son. Results of her compassionate approach and professional competence and brilliance are evident in remarkable improvements in our son. We are extremely grateful to her. 

Mr and Mrs Singh

September 11, 2023

We were lucky to get the guidance of Dr. Mona when we started this journey with our son as we were completely unaware of conditions like ASD,  she has been patient listening to all our concerns and gives us tips and remedies to help us get through. She has been a support and guide for us!!

When we first visited Dr. Gajre,  we were uncertain about formalities and procedures.  However, at the end of the process, not only as parents were we relieved but importantly reassured about our child's future  !! A very humble and amazing  professional  !! We strongly recommend her to all parents of children with learning disabilities  !!

Her very warm , considerate & highly able interaction & judgement ability made it absolutely easy for us to describe & explain about the ailment . She is also excellent in communicating with ailing child & her diagnosis was instant. Her therapy & treatment was highly  effective & far above our expectations.
Dr Mona is having thorough expertise about her domain. She is definitely an authority in her domain. Her vast experience *** ******** ********* ** *********
In my experience Dr. Mona Gajre is an incredible and a highly trained doctor. In my experience she is extremely good at her job and would definitely recommend her.

After meeting her, we gained a very useful knowledge about...which we feel all the parents or family members of children must know to proactively detect ailing symptoms if any, to ensure a timely treatment at the early stages.
